bossDialog: Come closer, traveler... Come closer... and DIE!
This is my domain. Your precious gods can't save you now.
Your screaming death shall be music to my ears!

cardBonuses.3: Your creatures' Spell Gems have 1 additional {STAT_charge}.
cardBonuses.6: Your creatures' Spell Gems have 1 additional {STAT_charge}.
cardBonuses.9: Your creatures' Spell Gems have 1 additional {STAT_charge}.

master.dialog: Banshees have access to empowered versions of different Spell Gems. If you don't manage to seal their gems early on in battle, you'll be sorry!\n\nWith that said, it's time to du-du-du-du-du-duel!
master.name: Shai

name: Banshee
